zh: 我不介意又烫又辣。

en: “Tom!” “Mary!”
zh: “汤姆！”“玛丽！”

en: Gin is not my friend.
zh: 我喝不了金酒。

en: It rained gently the whole day.
zh: 下了一整天的小雨。

en: Bye, Sayoko!
zh: 再见，小夜子！

en: Good-bye, Sayoko!
zh: 再见，小夜子！

en: Good day! You are our new neighbor, if I am not mistaken?
zh: 你好！如果我没认错的话，你应该是我们的新邻居吧？

en: I will call my grandmother to see whether or not she needs anything.
zh: 我会给奶奶打个电话，看看她需不需要什么。

en: I killed two birds with one stone.
zh: 我一举两得。

en: I crossed the street.
zh: 我过马路了。

en: This makes me curious.
zh: 这让我很好奇。

en: A is enough, but B is not enough.
zh: A够了，但B不够。

en: Excuse me, is this seat free?
zh: 打扰一下，请问这个位置有人吗？

en: Is there a pharmacy nearby?
zh: 这附近有药店吗？

en: If it looks like an apple and it tastes like an apple, it's probably an apple.
zh: 如果它看着像苹果，吃起来也像苹果，那估计就是个苹果。

en: Tom was sitting on a bench eating something that looked like an apple.
zh: 汤姆坐在长椅上，正吃着一个看着像苹果的东西。

en: The pears we eat in Japan look almost like apples.
zh: 我们在日本吃的梨看着跟苹果差不多。

en: John is indifferent about his clothes.
zh: 约翰对他穿什么衣服一点都不在乎。

en: What in the world do you think you're doing?
zh: 你到底在想什么呢？

en: What on earth do you think you're doing?
zh: 你到底在搞什么鬼？

en: I want to go to Hawaii next spring.
zh: 明年春天我想去夏威夷。

en: To tell the truth, sweetheart, I'm not at all interested.
zh: 说实话，宝贝，我一点兴趣都没有。

en: She is teaching us French.
zh: 她在教我们法语。

en: He has a headache.
zh: 他头疼。

en: Maybe he's jogging around the park.
zh: 也许他正在公园里慢跑。

en: Can you speak Chinese?
zh: 你会说中文吗？

en: She dumped me.
zh: 她把我给甩了。

en: I am truly sorry.
zh: 我真的很抱歉。

en: She has absolutely no enemies.
zh: 她一个敌人都没有。

en: He could recite the poem at age 5.
zh: 他五岁的时候就能背这首诗了。

en: Bears can climb trees.
zh: 熊会爬树。

en: Four people were in the car when the accident happened.
zh: 事故发生时，车里有四个人。

en: It would be good if you could sing.
zh: 要是你会唱歌就好了。

en: After the wind has stopped, let's sail the boat off to the open sea.
zh: 等风停了，咱们就把船开到外海去吧。

en: I am holding a glass bottle with a letter inserted.
zh: 我手里拿着一个塞了信的玻璃瓶。

en: That horror movie was very scary and I couldn't sleep after watching it.
zh: 那部恐怖片太吓人了，看完我觉都睡不着。

en: Finally, I found a job.
zh: 我终于找到工作了。

en: He is antisocial.
zh: 他这人挺不合群的。

en: I think that it's possible.
zh: 我觉得这有可能。

en: Everything will be fine.
zh: 一切都会好起来的。

en: Let's start translating!
zh: 咱们开始翻译吧！

en: I was able to swim faster when I was younger.
zh: 我年轻那会儿游得比现在快。

en: Look at the train crossing the bridge.
zh: 你看那列正在过桥的火车。

en: I'll be back at six-thirty.
zh: 我六点半回来。

en: I'll be back at half past six.
zh: 我六点半回来。

en: I'll be back at half six.
zh: 我六点半回来。

en: I'll be back at 6:30.
zh: 我六点半回来。

en: I come back home at 6:30.
zh: 我六点半回家。

en: I ran into your brother on the street.
zh: 我在街上碰见你哥了。

en: By chance, I met your brother on the street.
zh: 我碰巧在街上遇到了你哥。

en: I can't drink milk.
zh: 我喝不了牛奶。

en: Do you have a boyfriend or a girlfriend? Where did you meet them?
zh: 你有男朋友还是女朋友？你们是怎么认识的？

en: She's made up her mind to quit the company.
zh: 她已经决定辞职了。

en: I'm a realistic person.
zh: 我这人挺现实的。

en: I was born in Russia.
zh: 我是在俄罗斯出生的。

en: I'll be back at six.
zh: 我六点回来。

en: Although I don't remember how, I've been getting some bruises on my legs lately. What should I do if it's some kind of weird disease?
zh: 虽然不记得怎么弄的，但我腿上最近老有淤青。要是得了什么怪病可怎么办啊？

en: I am a teacher, not a student.
zh: 我是老师，不是学生。

en: My eyes hurt!
zh: 我眼睛疼！

en: Cocoa can be very bitter.
zh: 可可有时候会非常苦。

en: She looks young, but actually she's older than you are.
zh: 她看着挺年轻，其实比你岁数还大呢。

en: She is my best friend.
zh: 她是我最好的朋友。

en: Mariko went to the aesthetic salon.
zh: 真理子去美容院了。

en: Is there central heating in this building?
zh: 这栋楼有中央供暖吗？

en: I think that cultural exchanges are important.
zh: 我觉得文化交流挺重要的。

en: School violence is a big problem.
zh: 校园暴力是个大问题。

en: A stranger living nearby is better than a relative living far away.
zh: 远亲不如近邻。

en: Strangers close by are better than family far away.
zh: 远亲不如近邻。

en: Both of my parents are dead.
zh: 我爸妈都去世了。

en: Both of my parents have passed away.
zh: 我爸妈都不在了。

en: I doubt Tom will get here on time.
zh: 我怀疑汤姆能不能准时到。

en: It's gotten dark.
zh: 天黑了。

en: It's become dark.
zh: 天变黑了。

en: The only thing Tom likes to do after dinner is watch TV.
zh: 汤姆吃完饭唯一想干的事就是看电视。

en: The only place Tom has ever wanted to live is Boston.
zh: 汤姆唯一想住的地方就是波士顿。

en: When are you going to return from Milan?
zh: 你什么时候从米兰回来？

en: Did you complete the work?
zh: 你把活儿干完了吗？

en: There's a water shortage in this area.
zh: 这一带缺水。

en: Most car accidents happen because drivers aren't paying attention.
zh: 大多数车祸都是因为司机不专心。

en: I'm very tired now.
zh: 我现在累死了。

en: I'm disappointed in you.
zh: 我对你太失望了。

en: Stop bullying.
zh: 别再欺负人了。

en: They say that a person who has perfect pitch can tell just by listening what pitch a note is.
zh: 听说有绝对音感的人，一听就能知道是什么音。

en: Let's get drunk today!
zh: 咱们今天不醉不归！

en: He supposed that you would book seats.
zh: 他以为你会订座位的。

en: A lot of people living in our building don't like the owner.
zh: 我们这栋楼里好多人都不喜欢那个房东。

en: Have you seen a little girl with short black hair?
zh: 你看见一个黑短发的小姑娘了吗？

en: I'm too tired to do study.
zh: 我太累了，不想学了。

en: Are you sure you don't want to go with us?
zh: 你确定不跟我们一起去吗？

en: You should make sure that you get there on time. Tom won't wait more than ten minutes if you are late.
zh: 你一定要准时到。你要是迟到，汤姆最多等十分钟。

en: You should make sure that you don't make Tom angry.
zh: 你可千万别惹汤姆生气。

en: What did Tom expect Mary to do?
zh: 汤姆本来指望玛丽做什么？

en: We were unsure what kind of person Tom would be and whether he would like living in the same house as us.
zh: 我们拿不准汤姆这人怎么样，也不知道他喜不喜欢跟我们住一块。

en: Tom's great-great-great grandmother lived in Scotland.
zh: 汤姆的曾曾曾祖母以前住在苏格兰。

en: Tom's favorite Elvis Presley song is "Jailhouse Rock."
zh: 汤姆最喜欢的猫王歌曲是《监狱摇滚》。

en: Tom, Mary and John were playing tag on the playground.
zh: 汤姆、玛丽和约翰在操场上玩抓人游戏呢。

en: Tom wrote a letter to Mary.
zh: 汤姆给玛丽写了封信。

en: Tom would like to know the reason why Mary isn't here.
zh: 汤姆想知道玛丽为什么不在这。

en: Tom wondered how many times Mary was going to run around the track.
zh: 汤姆在想玛丽打算绕着跑道跑多少圈。

en: Tom wondered how many times Mary had been arrested.
zh: 汤姆在想玛丽被抓起来过几次。

en: Tom wished he had put more money into that investment.
zh: 汤姆真希望他当时能多投点钱。

en: Tom went to his high school reunion last week.
zh: 汤姆上周去参加高中同学聚会了。

en: Tom went out of his way to help Mary.
zh: 汤姆特意去帮了玛丽的忙。

en: Tom went for a walk and took pictures of things he saw.
zh: 汤姆去散步了，还拍了些路上的风景。

en: Tom wasn't able to find a babysitter on such short notice.
zh: 时间这么紧，汤姆没找着看孩子的保姆。

en: Tom was totally snockered before the party even began.
zh: 派对还没开始，汤姆就已经彻底喝醉了。

en: Tom was the only one who saw Mary sneak into the room.
zh: 只有汤姆看见玛丽溜进房间了。

en: Tom was the first to arrive.
zh: 汤姆是第一个到的。

en: Tom was shocked to hear that Mary had died.
zh: 听说玛丽去世了，汤姆很震惊。

en: Tom was killed in a traffic accident.
zh: 汤姆在车祸中丧生了。

en: Tom was killed in a plane crash.
zh: 汤姆在空难中丧生了。

en: Tom was killed by a stray bullet.
zh: 汤姆被流弹打死了。

en: Tom was injured in a traffic accident.
zh: 汤姆在车祸里受伤了。

en: Tom was in a hurry so he left his bed unmade.
zh: 汤姆赶时间，所以没叠被子就走了。
